tasks.task: Prepare cold frames for fall planting.
subtasks: Harvest seeds from previous herbs due to bolting.
Move cold frames closer to the house to avoid walnut toxicity.
Chip an area and line up containers for fall planting.
Retrieve soil from the pile at the bottom of the hill.
Fill containers with soil and plant cold-hardy herbs.

tasks.task: Overcome physical discomfort while driving to garden.
subtasks: Recognize signs of lightheadedness from car rides.
Drive carefully and take breaks to manage physical distress.

tasks.task: Document gardening activities for video editing.
subtasks: Film and edit the gardening process, including moving cold frames, planting, and preparation.
